<i class="pstatus"> 本帖最后由 xxxbao 于 2025-3-11 10:36 编辑 </i><br>
<br>
「英语学习其实没那么难，这本书啃一半，雅思 8.0。」<br>
书名《Oxford Picture Dictionary, 3rd Edition》，尚雯婕说的有点夸张，<br>
<br>
<br>
但确实是老少皆宜的美式英语学习工具书，豆瓣几乎满分。<br>
<img id="aimg_A50sS" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/03/11/pENhhpq.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/03/11/pENhhpq.jpg"><br>
<img id="aimg_N766C" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/03/11/pENhWhn.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://s21.ax1x.com/2025/03/11/pENhWhn.jpg"><br>
<img id="aimg_MZgX3" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://imgse.com/i/pENhWhn" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://imgse.com/i/pENhWhn"><br>
<img id="aimg_V1B40" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://imgse.com/i/pENhhpq" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://imgse.com/i/pENhhpq"><br>
没事也会翻几遍巩固单词。<br>
<br>
早上看到了，保存看了眼还不错，分享一下<br>
